views.markdown: Make CoreAnimation apps use the highest available FPS (same as your device's refresh rate). Head to Settings > CAHighFPS and enable the tweak for each of your apps. Read here for how the tweak works under-the-hood. Tested on these apps:

• Asphalt 8/9 (1.1.0+)
  • Safari Browser (1.0.3+)
  • Where's My Water 2
  • Plants vs Zombies (HD)
  • Plants vs Zombies 2
  • Bejeweled Blitz
  • Bejeweled Classic (HD)
  • Bloons TD 5
  • Tiny Wings
  • Real Racing 3
  • Jelly Defense

- Added support for an array of Metal-based apps
- Separate system and user apps in sections
